Privacy Policy
 
 Last Updated: December 30, 2020
 
 This Privacy Policy describes how information about you is collected, stored, used, and managed by Kravchenko Apps ("Kravchenko Apps", "us", "our" or "we"). This privacy policy applies to information that we collect when you use our websites, or any Kravchenko Apps mobile application (collectively, the "Services").
 
 
We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy. 
 
Information Collection 
 
We may automatically collect information about you when using our Services such as:
 
 
- Device Information: We may collect device specific information when you access our Services from a mobile device, such as unique device identifiers. 
- Use Information: We may collect information about all of your interactions with our Services. 
 
Use of Information 
 
We may use information about you for various purposes, such as to: 
 
- Provide, maintain and improve our Services 
- Monitor and analyze trends, usage and activities in connection with our Services 
- Provide advertisements, content, or features that match user profiles or activities 
 
Third Party Partners 
 
Out apps may contain APIs from third parties. Our third party partners, and their privacy policies are as follows: 
 
AdMob: http://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/terms/#subid=latam-semexp3-r3 
Google Analytics for Firebase: https://firebase.google.com/policies/analytics/ 
Flurry: http://www.flurry.com/legal-privacy/terms-service 
Google Play Games: https://developers.google.com/games/services/terms 
Firebase: https://www.firebase.com/terms/privacy-policy.html 
Yandex AppMetrika: https://yandex.ru/legal/confidential/?lang=en 
 
Security

Kravchenko Apps takes reasonable measures to protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration and destruction. 
 
Contact Us 
 
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at autozdes.net@gmail.com
